title: New & MPfree: Gauntlet Hair – Keep Time
body:
With the release of **[Gauntlet Hair’s](http://www.facebook.com/gauntlet.hair)** self-titled debut on October 14th drawing ever closer, the 2-piece have dropped a new cut from their LP, due out on **[Dead Oceans](http://deadoceans.com/onesheet.php?cat=DOC056)**. The track sits firmly in the realms of abstract psychedelic rock, but more that anything the record just sounds big, like really fucking big. Each vocal and drum programme has an enormous sense of grandeur and scope that it’s almost quite humbling to listen to.

If this pounding and glistening jam is anything to go by, their debut LP could really take some off guard.
